ygData.subject: Re: NPCs selling lambent stones (was Lambent Stones on  E'ci)5
ygData.msgSnippet: Until its sold.  How are the pawn items determined?  Does it show the first items sold to the NPC or the latest items?  I m not sure on this.
ygData.messageBody:
Until its sold. How are the pawn items determined? Does it show
the first items sold to the NPC or the latest items? I'm not sure on this.


>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Any idea how long it will be available for sale until it disappears?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> > Any location where a player has sold one to the npc. They appear in their
> > pawn shop slots only.
> >
> >
> > From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >
> > Well I learned something new today. I was always under the impression that
> > lambent stones could only be acquired by killing a giant or griffon. Never
> > knew you could buy them from NPCs. Can someone list the known locations
> > where NPCs sell them?
> >
> > Thanks
> > Galtin of E'ci
> >
> >
> > > Another thing. I was wanting a stone the other night for my last piece of
> > > Lambent. The zone was camped and I couldn't find ONE giant, much less
> > > two.
> > > I /auc'd for a stone and some jackass wanted 100pp. I said "Hey guy, I
> > > can
> > > buy one from the INN in Rathe Mts., a 60 second run, for 48pp." He called
> > > me a liar of course, so I ran to the Inn and bought it for 48pp.
> >
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> > with the subject submissions.
> >
> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with
> > the subject submissions.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
